recipesJson.name: RY1
recipesJson.author: 9KADE
recipesJson.description:
RY1 Recipe ..One Of the best my favorite tobacco recipe that I have itâ€™s light buttery smooth delicious balance flavor creamy taste end with some toasted nuts in the end 
Ry4 in 6% give full enough mouth feel flavor 
Butterscotch just kick in exhale with toasted almond .. touch of full flavor nuts at 0.7% ended with vanilla custard at 1.5% with light buttery creamy taste ..place over to the queen Graham cracker at 3% with some crunchy biscuit on tap please enjoy it.. please help me with feedback
Note : If you feel Ry4 is to hight you can make it at 4-5
